Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the sale of tickets to the general public by operators of theater, music, or sporting events taking place in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Sale of tickets to the general public by operators of theater, music, or sporting events taking place in NYC.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to amend the Arts and Cultural Affairs Law to define “e-ticket,” “paperless ticket” and “paperless ticketing system,” and calling for greater enforcement of current law relating to the transferability of tickets.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amend the Arts and Cultural Affairs Law to define “e-ticket,” “paperless ticket” and “paperless ticketing system".

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the sale of tickets to the general public by operators of theater, music, or sporting events taking place in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Sale of tickets to the general public by operators of theater, music, or sporting events taking place in NYC.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the sale of tickets to the general public by operators of theater, music, or sporting events taking place in New York City.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
